name: ACORN CONSULTING ON BEHALF OF INTERNATIONAL FRANCHISE ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Issues regarding joint employers under the National Labor Relations Act and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
Issues regarding joint employers under the National Labor Relations Act and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938. H.R. 5267, American Franchise Act; H.R. 4366, Save Local Business Act.
